name: Anastasia Long Workout Band
description:
Do you like the our first version of Anastasia, the workout band? It's a wonderful addition to your workout routine, however it's not made for all body types. Introducing the Anastasia Long Shaper, coverage extends above and below the area that the short version covers. More upper back coverage is the best part of the Long Workout Band. 





Have a long torso? 
Want to attack stubborn backfat and lower tummy pooch?
Add the Anastasia long workout band to your fitness routine today!
The Long workout band  style is designed to accelerate weight loss through compression and the sweating process, it also helps to mold your figure and support your back area. This vest provides more coverage for problem back fat areas and lower tummy troubles. Wear your workout shaper  proudly in any fitness arena!!!! 
Firm and superior boning that immediately corrects posture, reduces waistline, firms and flattens the tummy. 
Controls waist and abdomen keeping it always coke bottle correct. 
Helps with the conditions of weight gain, lower back pain, postpartum, C-section, abdominal surgical procedures, and overweight due to pregnancy and maternity. 
Made of natural Latex to give you maximum abdominal support 
Body Fabric: 97% Cotton 3% Elastane 
Lining: 100% Natural Hevea Latex 
Imported 
Wear this girdle from 1 to 3 hours on the first week and gradually increase the length of time you wear it, until you feel comfortable enough. Thereafter, it’s recommended to use it from 8 to 10 hours daily. Choose the size corresponding to your measurements in order to prevent discomfort during use or damage of the girdle. The Anastasia can be worn by beginners, while sleeping, and during a light workout. If you have physical problems, consult your doctor before wearing the girdle.

Note: Please follow our size chart carefully. Now our taller dolls can also wear this because it is approved for long and short torsos!
Materials: Linings: Spandex 4%, Cotton 96%, , Core: Latex 100%

name: Caffiene Cream Skin Tightening, Fat Burning
description:
Shipping included if ordered Caffeine Cream is used to burn fat cells and tighten skin.  Reduces appearance of stretch marks, smoothens skin for a younger rejuvenated look and helps to lessen the appearance of cellulite. Can be used on your whole body. Works best with Coke Bottle Curves Black Wrap Paper. You can also put your shaper on top for extra fat burning! 

Massage into skin with knuckles for deep massage effect after showering. Be sure to massage in. Wrap the area and then leave on for 45 minutes. Rinse off.


READ BELOW TO SEE HOW CAFFIENE CREAM WORKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!
How caffeine extract works?

Firstly, caffeine enhances fat metabolism. It stimulates the circulation of blood and helps remove toxins and excess fluids. When blood circulates, natural metabolism is stimulated making your body burn fat naturally. 
Speed the process up with healthy eating, working out and wrapping the stubborn body parts you are waging a war on.
 Secondly, caffeine extracts inhibits the fat deposition and increase fat burning. In a few studies made, caffeine is found out to have positive effect on fat cells. The protein lipoprotein lipase has the main function of storing fat in fat cells. This enzyme converts lipoprotein-bound triglycerides in the bloodstream into free triglycerides, which are eventually stored in the fat cells. Caffeine extract is said to limit the activities of lipoprotein lipase, which is the main culprit for storing fat cells.

 However, caffeine extracts should not be orally taken, it is supposed to be effective when taken as topical creams. Using this as a topical cream shall have stronger effect because it is more localized and concentrated on the affected area. Through oral use the caffeine will never reach the target area in a concentrated form. There has been a study, which has women having caffeine extract treatment. Studies show that 76% of the women, who completed the course, lost half an inch in thigh circumference after using topical creams with caffeine extract.
